title: Zootopia
plot_summary: In the city of Zootopia, where animals of all species coexist, optimistic rabbit Judy Hopps becomes the first bunny to join the police force. Eager to prove herself, she teams up with a cynical con-artist fox named Nick Wilde to solve a mysterious case of missing predators, uncovering a conspiracy that threatens the peace of Zootopia.

main_characters.name: Judy Hopps
main_characters.role: Protagonist, first rabbit police officer in Zootopia

main_characters.name: Nick Wilde
main_characters.role: Con artist who becomes Judy's partner

main_characters.name: Chief Bogo
main_characters.role: Chief of the Zootopia Police Department

main_characters.name: Flash
main_characters.role: DMV employee known for being extremely slow

awards: Academy Award for Best Animated Feature (2017)
Golden Globe for Best Animated Feature Film (2017)
Annie Award for Best Animated Feature (2017)
